tasks.task_description: Write requirements.md with user stories and EARS notation
Write design.md with technical architecture and diagrams
Write tasks.md with detailed implementation plan

description: Create comprehensive specification for promptz.dev Hugo website with Tailwind CSS
context: Created requirements.md with 9 comprehensive requirements covering content management, taxonomy, search, design, SEO, pages, hosting, performance, and formatting. Each requirement includes user stories and detailed EARS notation acceptance criteria.

Created comprehensive design.md with technical architecture including system architecture diagram, content organization, data models, Hugo configuration, theme structure, Tailwind CSS setup, search implementation with Pagefind, SEO optimization, GitHub workflow integration, and deployment pipeline. Includes detailed mermaid diagrams for architecture visualization.

Created comprehensive implementation plan (tasks.md) with 27 detailed tasks organized into 9 phases: Project Setup, Content Management, Design System, Search Implementation, Homepage/Content Pages, SEO/Performance, GitHub Integration, Testing, and Documentation/Launch. Each task includes specific implementation steps and maps to requirements from requirements.md.
